Explanation: This section provides you a brief explanation of the command.
Examples: This is where you can see the Examples

Explanation: Creates a batch of users in an identity domain using an ANSI or UTF-8 encoded Comma Separated Value (CSV) file that was uploaded to the environment. Also informs new users of their user name and temporary password.
Adds a batch of users to an existing group in Access Control using an ANSI or UTF-8 encoded CSV file that was uploaded to the environment.
Login to EPM Instance using your user name and password. You can also login using your user name and encyrpted password file.
Examples: Using unencrypted password: epmautomate login USERNAME PASSWORD URL
Using encrypted file: epmautomate login USERNAME PASSWORD_FILE URL

Explanation: Lists the names of the files in the default location, Data Management folders, and profitinbox/profitoutbox (Profitability and Cost Management).
